product_name: Ibex Carrie Button-Up Cardigan Sweater - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Warmth doesn't bunch or frump in the Ibex Carrie Button-Up Cardigan sweater. The double-knit merino fabric stays smooth and layers well with its smart look and natural warmth. New Zealand merino wool and polyester boucle-knit has a soft, textured outer face and a smooth interior face. This wool blend is a sturdy, long-wearing fabric that's wind-, water- and stain-repellent. Ibex Carrie Button-Up Cardigan sweater has raglan sleeves for unhindered shoulder movement; hand pockets. Relaxed fit; machine washable. Wool meets Zque(TM) standards, ensuring environmental, social and economic sustainability, as well as animal welfare and traceability back to the source. Closeout.
short_description: Warmth doesn't bunch or frump in the Ibex Carrie Button-Up Cardigan sweater. The double-knit merino fabric stays smooth and layers well with its smart look and natural warmth.
